UnderwritingRule.name: UnderwritingRule
UnderwritingRule.description: Represents details of an underwriting rule for a product.

ApiName.description: The API name of the underwriting rule.

Description.description: The description about the underwriting rule.

DynamicRuleDefinition.description: The scope and conditions specified for the dynamic rule.

EffectiveFromDateTime.description: The date and time from when the underwriting rule became active.

EffectiveToDateTime.description: The date and time after when the underwriting rules became inactive.

EvaluationFailureTaskGroupId.description: The group of tasks related to a fulfillment plan that’s executed when the rule evaluation fails.

EvaluationSuccessTaskGroupId.description: The group of tasks related to a fulfillment plan that’s executed when the rule evaluation is successful.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the underwriting rule.

ProductPath.description: A path containing the product IDs that roll up to the parent product.

Sequence.description: The sequence in which the rule is executed.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the underwriting rule.

UnderwritingRuleGroupId.description: The underwriting rule group associated with this underwriting rule.
